name: EsterEgo
description:
In a word of technology when putting yourself out there is easier than ever, ester has all the opportunity to post her art to the world wide web. But this comes with a heavy cost, the cost of comments damaging her fragile ego. on every art auction  She must navigating the maze or snide remarks and nice comments, like the ones that compliment and disliking the ones that doing to keep here ego in above dangerously low levels.

all assets were made by me

Left Click to like/dislike comments

Right Click to change like/dislike
